turkish_example_sentence: Ben o eski şirketten daha erken ayrılmış olsaydım, yeni kariyer fırsatlarını yakalardım
english_example_sentence: If I had left that old company earlier, I would have caught new career opportunities
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я покинул ту старую компанию раньше, я бы поймал новые карьерные возможности
